channel.title: Making a jail (last step) NEED HELP

item.title: Making a jail (last step) NEED HELP
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok here is my code
if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.teleportToX = 3226;
		p.teleportToY = 3407;
                 p.teleblock = true;


                    p.sendMessage("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sendMessage("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
           }
        }

it works fantastic the ony prob is that u can tele out by using magic book spells. but you cant tele from emote menu or ::home (a mag fore stops u). soooo i need help with codeing it so u cant use mage book teles to get out thanks alot. PS. im the owner of B15.servebeer.com

Read full topic
item.source: Making a jail (last step) NEED HELP
